message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I appreciate it, but I'm looking to pay closer to $130.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $135. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. What do you think?
